title: kAdalukku idupOl
sahitya:
kAdalukku idupOl shOdanai EdukkO sakhi kandanaik-kaNDadum endanukku uNDAna


anupallavi

  vEdanaikku uLLAghi pEdaiyEnadu uLLam veDikkAdavan aruL kiDaikkumO shollaDi


caraNam    tanjam avan tAnenru nenjam enadileNNi kenjuginrEn enru kUccaminrik-kUrippin
konjik-kulaviyinda kOdaiyin vEdanai tIra konjamEnum karuNai koLLak-kOri vADi
